verses.text: Make a joyful noise unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, all ye lands.+ 100.1 praise: or, thanksgiving*+ 100.1 all…: Heb. all the earth*
Serve the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** with gladness: come before his presence with singing.
Know ye that the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** he is* God: it is* he that* hath made us, and not we ourselves; we are* his people, and the sheep of his pasture.+ 100.3 and not…: or, and his we are*
Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and* into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and* bless his name.
For the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* good; his mercy is* everlasting; and his truth endureth* to all generations.+ 100.5 to all…: Heb. to generation and generation*
